Name: Horror Hotel
About the game: Horror Hotel is a top-down, 2D shooter which pits you against increasingly difficult gauntlets for foes. The demons of Hell have invaded a remote hotel, and you must defeat them using a combination of spells and your trusty Rune Stone. The Rune Stone is your primary weapon, throw it at demons to destroy them. Don’t worry, it comes back… To be victorious, you must take the fight to your enemies by traveling to Hell and destroying the twelve demon generals leading the invasion. You are the Doctor, and it’s time to cleanse this hotel.
